channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - geeqie

item.title: My application base: geekie
item.description: In the past, when I had to manage my images (pictures) I used GQview (which started back in 2008). But the application doesn't get many updates, and if an application does not get many updates, it either means it is no longer maintained or that it does its job perfectly â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
